contents.text: Welcome to Jumpshot, delivering digital intelligence from within the Internet’s most valuable walled gardens.
For sales and new business inquiries, press 1.
For product demonstrations and feature overviews, press 1.
Please hold the line and we’ll connect you with a sales engineer shortly.

navigationGoals: Connect with a sales engineer for a rapid product demo.
As a veteran entrepreneur exploring analytics, I want a live demo of Jumpshot’s digital intelligence features.
I’d like to schedule a detailed product demo focusing on your API data ingestion and analytics tool.
I’d like someone to walk me through a live demonstration of your product features, please.
I’d like a walkthrough of the platform’s key features relevant to my research.

contents.text: For pricing, licensing, and package options, press 2.
Please hold the line while we transfer you to our pricing specialists.

navigationGoals: Get detailed pricing and licensing information for our planned purchase.
I need detailed pricing and licensing info for small-scale use supporting veteran programs.
I need information on your enterprise licensing tiers, pricing models, and volume discount options.
Could you explain your pricing plans and how much it would cost for my small organization?
I’d like details on academic pricing and licensing options for student use.

contents.text: For customer support and technical assistance, press 2.
For implementation and onboarding support, press 1.
Please hold the line; we are connecting you to our onboarding support team.

navigationGoals: Arrange immediate onboarding assistance to set up the platform.
I need assistance onboarding and integrating Jumpshot’s platform with my veteran outreach initiatives.
I need onboarding support to integrate your API into our data pipeline with secure authentication.
I need help setting up my new account and getting started with your service.
I need help configuring the platform for my university lab’s onboarding.

contents.text: For troubleshooting and technical issues, press 2.
Please hold the line while we transfer you to a technical support representative.

navigationGoals: Resolve a technical issue by speaking with a support representative.
I’m unable to access my Jumpshot dashboard; please help me troubleshoot the login issue.
I’m experiencing 502 errors when calling your API endpoints and need technical troubleshooting.
I’m having trouble logging in and need technical assistance to fix the error I’m seeing.
I’m facing an API integration error and need technical support.
